channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 美联储观点推动美元徘徊在六周高位附近；日本央行推动日元小幅上涨
item.description: The dollar hovered near a six-week high against major peers on Wednesday as investors cemented expectations that the Federal Reserve would be in no rush to cut interest rates in the face of a resilient U.S. economy.翻译:周三，美元兑主要货币徘徊在六周高点附近，因投资者强化了美联储在美国经济强劲的情况下不会急于降息的预期。
item.author: Kevin Buckland

item.title: 菲律宾称武装部队将确保南海“畅通无阻、和平”的勘探
item.description: The Philippines armed forces will guarantee the "unimpeded and peaceful" exploration and exploitation of natural resources within the country's exclusive economic zone (EEZ) as it shifts its focus to external defence, Manila's defense secretary said.翻译:马尼拉国防部长表示，随着菲律宾将重点转向对外防御，菲律宾武装部队将保证在该国专属经济区（EEZ）内“不受阻碍、和平”地勘探和开采自然资源。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国表示欧盟“不公平”的电动汽车补贴调查可能会损害两国关系 - 彭博社
item.description: China's ambassador to the European Union called the EU's probe into Chinese electric vehicle manufacturers over state subsidies "unfair", Fu Cong told Bloomberg News in an interview.翻译:傅聪在接受彭博社采访时表示，中国驻欧盟大使称欧盟对中国电动汽车制造商国家补贴的调查“不公平”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 图瓦卢预计将在大选后重新审视与台湾的关系——部长
item.description: Tuvalu expects to review its diplomatic ties with Taiwan after Friday's election, Finance Minister Seve Paeniu told Reuters, adding voters in the tiny Pacific Island nation wanted more financial support from the international community for climate change and development.翻译:图瓦卢财政部长 Seve Paeniu 告诉路透社，图瓦卢预计在周五选举后重新审视与台湾的外交关系，并补充说这个太平洋小岛国的选民希望国际社会为气候变化和发展提供更多财政支持。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 投资者团体对尾矿坝落后者加大力度
item.description: A group of investors managing more than $25 trillion said they plan to challenge mining companies that have not yet committed to a tailings dam best-practice standard and may vote against management at upcoming annual meetings.翻译:一群管理着超过 25 万亿美元的投资者表示，他们计划挑战尚未承诺尾矿坝最佳实践标准的矿业公司，并可能在即将举行的年度会议上投票反对管理层。
item.author: Clara Denina, Simon Jessop

item.title: 美国议员抵达台湾表达大选后支持
item.description: The leaders of the U.S. House of Representatives Taiwan Caucus, Republican Representative Mario Diaz Balart and Democratic Representative Ami Bera, have arrived in Taipei, their offices said on Tuesday, in a show of support after the island's election.翻译:美国众议院台湾核心小组领导人、共和党众议员马里奥·迪亚斯·巴拉特和民主党众议员阿米·贝拉办公室周二表示，他们已抵达台北，以在台湾大选后表示支持。
item.author: Patricia Zengerle

item.title: 早盘：考验中港股反弹能力
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 吉尔吉斯斯坦与新疆边境发生5.67级余震
item.description: An earthquake of magnitude 5.67 struck the Kyrgyzstan-Xinjiang border region on Wednesday, just a day after a magnitude 7.1 quake in the same area, the German Research Center for Geosciences (GFZ) said.翻译:德国地球科学研究中心 (GFZ) 表示，吉尔吉斯斯坦和新疆边境地区周三发生了 5.67 级地震，就在同一地区发生了 7.1 级地震的一天后。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 由于罗纳尔多在迈阿密国际交锋前受伤，纳斯尔推迟了中国友谊赛
item.description: Cristiano Ronaldo's Al-Nassr have cancelled their two-game China tour after the forward suffered an injury, the Saudi club said on Tuesday, sparking concern over the Portuguese's participation in their upcoming encounter against Lionel Messi's Inter Miami.翻译:沙特俱乐部周二表示，克里斯蒂亚诺·罗纳尔多(Cristiano Ronaldo)的纳斯尔(Al-Nassr)在前锋受伤后取消了两场中国之旅，这引发了人们对葡萄牙人参加即将对阵莱昂内尔·梅西(Lionel Messi)的迈阿密国际的比赛的担忧。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 由于希望得到北京方面的支持，在美国上市的中国股市从低点反弹
item.description: New York-listed shares of Chinese companies bounced back on Tuesday after a dour start to the year, after a report of a rescue package for the slumping domestic stock market buoyed sentiment.翻译:周二，在纽约上市的中国公司股票在经历了年初的低迷之后反弹，此前有关针对低迷的国内股市的救助计划的报道提振了市场情绪。
item.author: Medha Singh

item.title: 马云第四季度购买了价值 5000 万美元的阿里巴巴股票 - 纽约时报
item.description: Alibaba co-founder Jack Ma and Chairman Joe Tsai bought millions worth of shares in the Chinese e-commerce giant in the fourth quarter, the New York Times reported on Tuesday, sending the company's U.S.-listed shares up around 7%.翻译:据《纽约时报》周二报道，阿里巴巴联合创始人马云和董事长蔡崇信在第四季度购买了这家中国电子商务巨头价值数百万股的股票，导致该公司在美国上市的股价上涨约 7%。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 马尔代夫称中国船只不会在其海域进行研究
item.description: A Chinese research vessel on its way to the Maldives will not conduct any research while in the archipelago's waters in the Indian Ocean, the Maldivian foreign ministry said on Tuesday.翻译:马尔代夫外交部周二表示，一艘前往马尔代夫的中国科考船不会在印度洋群岛海域进行任何研究。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 投资者放弃徒劳地等待中国修复经济
item.description: From hope to hesitancy and now total capitulation, global investors in China are heading for the exits in the world's second-biggest economy and sending its stock market crashing.翻译:从希望到犹豫，再到现在的彻底投降，中国的全球投资者正纷纷撤离这个世界第二大经济体，并导致中国股市崩盘。
item.author: Samuel Shen, Rodrigo Campos

item.title: 阿尔卡拉斯网球协会为墨尔本兹维列夫考试做准备
item.description: Second seed Carlos Alcaraz faces arguably the toughest test of his Australian Open campaign when he faces Germany's Alexander Zverev in the quarter-finals at Melbourne Park on Wednesday, in a match that promises to be a fascinating clash of styles.翻译:二号种子卡洛斯·阿尔卡拉斯周三在墨尔本公园四分之一决赛中迎战德国选手亚历山大·兹维列夫，这无疑将面临澳大利亚网球公开赛中最严峻的考验，这场比赛有望成为一场精彩的风格冲突。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾马科斯表示不支持台独 寻求避免冲突
item.description: Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr said he does not endorse Taiwan independence and reiterated his country was committed to its One-China policy, a response to China's outrage over recent remarks in congratulating Taiwan's election winner.翻译:菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯表示，他不支持台湾独立，并重申菲律宾致力于一个中国政策，这是对中国对最近祝贺台湾选举获胜者的言论感到愤怒的回应。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 宝洁公司强劲的利润率缓解了年度利润预测下调的影响
item.description: Procter & Gamble cut its annual profit forecast on Tuesday to reflect a writedown in the value of its Gillette business, but the company's ability to maintain healthy margins during the second quarter pushed its shares up more than 5%.翻译:宝洁公司周二下调了年度利润预期，以反映其吉列业务价值的减记，但该公司第二季度保持健康利润率的能力推动其股价上涨超过 5%。
item.author: Ananya Mariam Rajesh

item.title: 3M年度利润预测因电子产品和中国需求低迷而受到挤压
item.description: Industrial conglomerate 3M forecast full-year earnings below Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, saying the macro environment "remains muted" and sending its shares plunging about 12%.翻译:工业集团 3M 周二预测全年盈利低于华尔街预期，称宏观环境“依然低迷”，导致其股价暴跌约 12%。
item.author: Kannaki Deka

item.title: 意大利希望利用七国集团主席国加强对乌克兰的支持，并审查人工智能
item.description: Italy will use its presidency of the Group of Seven major democracies to challenge growing perceptions that Russia is winning in Ukraine and that the West is tiring of the war, a source familiar with Italy's G7 plans said.翻译:一位熟悉意大利七国集团计划的消息人士称，意大利将利用七国集团主席国的身份来挑战人们日益增长的看法，即俄罗斯正在乌克兰获胜以及西方已经厌倦了战争。
item.author: Crispian Balmer, Angelo Amante

item.title: 独家：Fortescue中国铁矿石清关面临罕见延误--消息人士
item.description: At least two iron ore cargoes from the world's No.4 supplier Fortescue Metals Group are facing unusual customs delays at north China's Caofeidian port due to inspections for solid waste, sources with knowledge of the matter said.翻译:据知情人士透露，来自全球第四大供应商福蒂斯丘金属集团的至少两批铁矿石货物在中国北方曹妃甸港因固体废物检查而面临异常海关延误。
item.author: Melanie Burton

item.title: 吉尔吉斯斯坦与中国边境发生强烈地震，造成3人死亡
item.description: A magnitude 7.1 earthquake struck the Kyrgyzstan-Xinjiang border region on Tuesday, leading to the collapse of homes and killing at least three people and injuring five, Chinese state media reported.翻译:据中国官方媒体报道，吉尔吉斯斯坦和新疆边境地区周二发生里氏7.1级地震，导致房屋倒塌，造成至少3人死亡、5人受伤。
item.author: Reuters
